patterns: How do I request a day off
I need to request time off
How to claim a sick day
responses: Time off for Doctor's appointments, sick leave, and vacation time are all handled using the 'Apply Leave' app available on OneCognizant here:https://onecognizant.cognizant.com/Home?

responses: The steps to install software are located here: https://onecognizant.cognizant.com/Home?GlobalAppID=2425

responses: There is a tutorial applicable to your vpn connection issues here: https://onecognizantbcazrapps.cognizant.com/2308/Areas/RequestManage/Content/Images/installation-guideline-pip-up.png

responses: You can reach GSD by phone here: U.S. 1-866-822-2024, UK 0800-678-1616, or India 1800-572-0473

patterns: Where do I go to schedule a cloud certification
How do I schedule an AWS cloud exam
Where do I go to schedule an Azure cloud test
Where do I go to do Azure cloud exam
I need to request certification reimbursement
How to claim reimbursement for a certification
responses: The AWS exam is Scheduled here: https://www.aws.training/certification, The Azure exam is Scheduled here: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/learning/dashboard.aspx! There is no hard deadline for completion of either exam. The Alliance site for Certification Vouchers is located: https://be.cognizant.com/sites/cognizant-academy/SitePageModern/772073/alliances-partnership

You can Scheduled the AWS here: https://www.aws.training/certification, You can Scheduled the Azure exam here: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/learning/dashboard.aspx! There is no hard deadline for completion of either exam. The Alliance site for Certification Vouchers is located: https://be.cognizant.com/sites/cognizant-academy/SitePageModern/772073/alliances-partnership

patterns: How do I change my address
I need to update my address
responses: Contact Tasneem, the HR Manager, here: TasneemS.Arrarwala@cognizant.com!

patterns: How do I see my pay info
Something is wrong with my pay
I have questions about my pay
responses: You can reach the ADP pay site at: https://be.cognizant.com/sites/global-human-resources/united-states-human-resources/SitePage/323837/us-payroll or try emailing the payroll helpdesk here: PayrollHelpdeskNA@cognizant.com! Note: Bonuses arrive as a seperate check on the 1st 15th of the month after 30 days of employment.

patterns: How do we access the onboarding checklist

responses: The onboarding checklist can be found here: https://be.cognizant.com/sites/onboarding-north-america/SitePage/286127/north-america-onboarding

patterns: What do I do about spam
Where do I report phishing attempt
responses: 1. For Windows machine, use the Report Spam Plugin available in outlook to send the reported email as an attachment. 2. For non-Windows machine (Mac, mobile, etc.), you can send the reported email as an attachment (.msg format) to reportspam@cognizant.com.

patterns: What do I do about a training conflict
Some of my trainings are scheduled at the same time
How to resolve training schedule conflict
training schedule for same time as
responses: If you have a training conflict, reach out to Antoinette Saade at: Antoinette.Saade@cognizant.com!
